roleset.name: engrave again
roleset.note: REINSCRIBE-V NOTES: Framed by Jena. (from reinscribe.01-v)

example.name: passive, with surface and message
example.text: He once asked Wang-2 to *-2 re-inscribe an old seal *0* Huang had picked up on an antiques stall.
example.arg: an old seal *0* Huang had picked up on and antiques stall
